original_text: And he made the laver of brass, and the foot of it of brass, of the lookingglasses of the women assembling, which assembled at the door of the tabernacle of the congregation.
korean_text: 그가 놋으로 물두멍을 만들고 그 받침도 놋으로 하였으니 곧 회막 문에서 수종드는 여인들의 거울로 만들었더라

sentences.original_text: And he made laver of brass
and the foot of it of brass
of the looking-glasses of the women assembling
which assembled at the door of the tabernacle
sentences.korean_translation: 그 여인들은 성막 문에 모이던 자들이더라
